name: Crysis Wars

files.game: N/A:Select the Crysis Wars installer provided by GOG.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Crysis Wars installer provided by GOG.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Crysis Wars/Bin64/Crysis.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx10_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: false
